resources.string: Click Answer to see the answer.\nClick next to see another question.\nClick Manage Questions on the Menu to add and remove questions.
Click Answer to see the answer
There are no items on the list.\nIf you want to add some, please click on the Add button on the menu.
The question must have at most %d characters.
Are you sure you want to remove this question?

To use Kotoba:
	1. Go to the Main Screen.
	2. Click Next to see another question.
	3. Click Answer to see the answer to the current question.
	4. Click Manage Questions to add, remove or update questions.
